Header: Prime Minister’s Tour to India Due This Month
Content: The Indian Express says that Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe is due to visit India at the end of the month. The press mentions that he is expecting to meet The Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Indian Opposition Leader Sonia Gandhi. The press further declared that Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe is due to meet a few high rank officers of the Indian government in New Delhi. In response to an inquiry by Hiru News, a senior officer at the Prime Minister’s office said that Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe will be making his initial official overseas tour to India according to the tradition after his appointment as Prime Minister.
